data.name: Salvation in Corruption
data.detailed_description:
Nov. 11: New content teaser!

We are pleased to announce that Salvation in Corruption has finally launched on Steam! With that being said, Blak Iron Studios is hard at work preparing the newest batch of updates and new content for the world of Galamar. To begin, all of our newest content updates will be taking place on the 10th of each announced month, so what can you expect on the 10th of December? Well strap in because we got a lot coming! Firstly, the world will be expanding! In December you will be able to explore the next Outpost along the Balerun wall! The Nargi Outpost will hold not only more resource areas, but also new quests, monster fights, and even a secret skilling station for you to make use of! Further south we will see the release of the Forests of Gerinyer, which will hold tribes of Orcks and a fresh new village with plenty of skilling stations and a bundle of new quests and monsters to dive into! To the north will come the mystical Frozen Forest, home to the elusive settlememts of the Darkling race. With this will come new quests, monsters, skilling stations and a brand new set of skilling location for you to harvest! More updates will be announced as we draw closer to the day of the update, so stay sharp! We are going to be releasing videos on our upcoming Blak Iron Studios Youtube channel, so when that is released, smash the subscribe button to keep up with any new content! Have fun on you adventures! ~Chris at Blak Iron Studios


About the Game

Take part in an adventure unlike any other as you enter the mystical world of Galamar! Embark on an epic fantasy adventure where you can create your own hero, gather resources, craft your own gear, and take on monsters unlike anything you have seen before. Take part in an epic tale of your own choosing as you uncover the secrets of the very world you walk upon. Defeat ancient monsters, summon beasts to your side, wield legendary weapons, even own entire regions of land in this epic quest that will truly never end! Salvation in Corruption is an RPG game that takes place in a massive world that is yours to explore how you choose featuring a unique crafting system, Quest Journal, Property Ownership, repeatable Boss Fights, and an immersive storyline that will grow for years to come! Featuring custom graphics, gender and class selection, holiday events, live music, voice acting, and an ever growing world, Salvation in Corruption is a must have in any Roleplaying game enthusiasts collection! So gear up, choose your path, and make a name in the world of Galamar! Blak Iron Studios would like to extend a special thank you for the wonderful Plug-ins made available by SumRndmDde, whose site can be found here: http://sumrndm.site/

data.short_description: A world of magic, monsters, gods, and riches is on the horizon! Choose your path in an ever expanding world! Adventure awaits!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
